descripcion:
Major ingredient is SQMÂ´s own high quality potassium nitrate. Includes a chelated micronutrient package.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Ammonium Sulfate, Urea, Iron EDTA, Iron EDDHA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367.

POTENTIAL ACIDITY: 520 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.

SOLUBILITY (max.): 1 lb per gallon in cold water. Hot water and agitation improve solubility.
